targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and (r._field == "accel_x" or r._field == "accel_y" or r._field == "accel_z"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and (r._field == "gyro_x" or r._field == "gyro_y" or r._field == "gyro_z"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and (r._field == "mag_x" or r._field == "mag_y" or r._field == "mag_z"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and r._field == "heading")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "imu_sensors" and r._field == "heading")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "heart_rate")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "spo2")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "heart_rate")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "spo2")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "heart_confidence")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "spo2_confidence")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "heart_rate")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "health_sensors" and r._field == "spo2")
  |> drop(columns: ["sensor", "topic"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "esp32_pir_imu" and r._field == "motion_detected")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "esp32_pir_imu" and r._field == "motion_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "esp32_pir_imu" and (r._field == "accel_x" or r._field == "accel_y" or r._field == "accel_z"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sgp40_voc" and r._field == "voc_index")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sgp40_voc" and r._field == "voc_index")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sgp40_voc" and r._field == "raw_gas")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "sensor_data")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "esp32_pir_imu" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> last()

description: Real-time monitoring of MQTT sensor data - Temperature, Humidity, Pressure, and other sensor metrics from IoT devices
